about.label: About Your Guide
about.title: Your
about.intro: Hi! I'm Ricardo, your dedicated guide to experiencing the real Cuba. Born and raised in Havana, I've spent over 25 years helping travelers discover the authentic beauty, rich culture, and warm spirit of my island.
about.description: From the colorful streets of Old Havana to the pristine beaches of Varadero, from the tobacco fields of Vi√±ales to the colonial charm of Trinidad, I know every corner of Cuba like the back of my hand. My mission is to create personalized experiences that go beyond typical tourist routes.
about.localKnowledgeDesc: Access to hidden gems and authentic experiences
about.support247Desc: Always available to make your trip perfect

experiences.label: Unforgettable Journeys
experiences.title: Curated Cuban
experiences.subtitle: From vibrant cities to pristine beaches, from cultural immersion to natural wonders: discover the many faces of Cuba with custom-designed itineraries.
experiences.ctaQuestion: Ready to create your perfect Cuban adventure?
